remarks: An (eventually) constant sequence converges to its value.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
climconst.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climconst.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climconst.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
climconst.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
climconst.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
climconst $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
